content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu, 

I am willing to negotiate the price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your willingness to negotiate, I'll make the first offer. I propose a price of 700 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Here is my next offer. I propose a price of 750 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Here is my next offer. I propose a price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is better, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Here is my next offer. I propose a price of 850 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is still not high enough. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Here is my next offer. I propose a price of 900 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is closer to what I am looking for, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
